name: Public school teachers who reported various types of access to computers or the Internet provided to their students by the district or school, by school characteristics: 2018–19
description: Public school teachers who reported various types of access to computers or the Internet provided to their students by the district or school, by school characteristics: 2018–19

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_teachers_school_has_additional_academic_period_when_students_can_use_computers_and_internet_for_homework
variableMeasured.description: All Teachers School Has Additional Academic Period When Students Can Use Computers And Internet For Homework

variableMeasured.name: field_all_teachers_district_or_school_provides_mobile_hotspots_students_take_home
variableMeasured.description: All Teachers District Or School Provides Mobile Hotspots Students Take Home

variableMeasured.name: field_all_teachers_students_take_home_a_district_or_school_provided_computeron_long_term_basis
variableMeasured.description: All Teachers Students Take Home A District Or School Provided Computeron Long Term Basis

variableMeasured.name: field_teachers_whose_students_take_home_a_district_or_school_provided_computer_who_have_some_students_not_able_to_take_a_computer_homea
variableMeasured.description: Teachers Whose Students Take Home A District Or School Provided Computer Who Have Some Students Not Able To Take A Computer Homea

variableMeasured.name: field_teachers_whose_students_do_not_have_a_district_or_school_provided_computer_to_take_homeb_students_can_borrow_school_computers_to_take_home_on_short_term_basis
variableMeasured.description: Teachers Whose Students Do Not Have A District Or School Provided Computer To Take Homeb Students Can Borrow School Computers To Take Home On Short Term Basis

variableMeasured.name: field_teachers_whose_students_do_not_have_a_district_or_school_provided_computer_to_take_homeb_students_can_access_school_computers_outside_of_class_time_e_g_before_or_after_school_at_lunch_in_special_periods_
variableMeasured.description: Teachers Whose Students Do Not Have A District Or School Provided Computer To Take Homeb Students Can Access School Computers Outside Of Class Time E G Before Or After School At Lunch In Special Periods

notes: This table includes public school teachers who teach at least one regularly scheduled class in grades 3–12 and teach either (1) self-contained classes, or (2) departmentalized classes in one or more of the core subjects of English and language arts, social studies and social science, math, or science. The table excludes those who teach only special education, bilingual education, or English as a Second Language.
sources: Gray L, Lewis L, Teachers' Use of Technology for School and Homework Assignments: 2018–19, NCES 2020-048, U.S. Department of Education, National Center for Education Statistics (2020), https://nces.ed.gov/pubsearch/pubsinfo.asp?pubid=2020048. Science and Engineering Indicators
